client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Paypal developer application.

client_secret.title: Client secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Paypal developer application.

refresh_token.title: Refresh token
refresh_token.description: The key to refresh the expired access token.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Start Date for data extraction in ISO format. Date must be in range from 3 years till 12 hrs before present time.

is_sandbox.title: Sandbox
is_sandbox.description: Determines whether to use the sandbox or production environment.
